bookTitle: Ghost Stations (The True Lives Of The Fabulous Killjoys, #2)
bookAuthors: Gerard Way, Shaun Simon, Becky Cloonan
Plot: Many years ago Cherri Cola was a Killjoy, a sharp-shooter, and a DJ giving voice to the vagabonds of the Desert. Today, he mourns the death of his former comrades and seeks out the young girl who went missing following their bloody demise. His listeners dwindle as a new rebellion takes hold and war promises to rage once again.
